title: Raise the bar
slogan: A free online course on data visualization beyond the bar graph
description: This workshop was designed to help beginner R users and educators learn alternatives to bar graphs. It was built with the Ines Montani's website framework.
bio: This workshop was developed as a part of the ESA/CSEE 2022 Joint Annual Meeting in Montreal, Canada. It was the product of a collaboration between Marney Pratt, June Arriens, Audrey McCombs, and Dan Turner.
